They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="1">List of cookies‎</button></div></div></div><div class="ot-accordion-layout ot-cat-item ot-vs-config" data-optanongroupid="3"><button aria-expanded="false" ot-accordion="true" aria-controls="ot-desc-id-3" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-3"></button><!-- Accordion header --><div class="ot-acc-hdr"><div class="ot-plus-minus"><span></span><span></span></div><h4 class="ot-cat-header" id="ot-header-id-3">Functional Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-3" id="ot-group-id-3" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="3" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-3"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-3"><span class="ot-switch-nob"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Functional Cookies</span></label> </div></div><!-- accordion detail --><div class="ot-acc-grpcntr ot-acc-txt"><p class="ot-acc-grpdesc ot-category-desc" id="ot-desc-id-3">These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. .marketingBanner{background-color: #00ff46;position: fixed;bottom: 0;right: 0;z-index: 9999;width: 100%;} .marketingBanner__container {padding: 0.9rem;} .marketingBanner__content h3, .marketingBanner__content p {color: #150526;margin: 0;font-size: 1.15rem;line-height:1.4}.marketingBanner__content h3 {font-family: open-sans,sans-serif} .marketingBanner__content p{font-family: open-sans,sans-serif}.marketingBanner__button.button {background-color: #150526;color: #00ff46;}@media(max-width: 767px){.marketingBanner__content p {display: none;}.marketingBanner__content {margin-bottom: 0.9rem;}} .marketingBanner__container .col {margin:0; width: auto;} button#closeMarketingBanner {position: absolute; right: 22px; background: transparent; border: none;color: #fff; font-size: 18px; text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer;} .marketingBanner p{transition: all 500ms ease; } button#closeMarketingBanner{font-size:16px;} .smallerDiv.marketingBanner{font-size:18px; font-weight:normal;} .smallerDiv.marketingBanner h3{font-size:18px; font-weight:normal;} .smallerDiv.marketingBanner p{font-size:0;} .smallerDiv.marketingBanner .colWrapper{justify-content:center; padding:15px; align-items: center;} .smallerDiv.marketingBanner .button{margin-left:10px !important;min-width: 30px; text-decoration:underline;font-size:18px; background:none; padding:0; height: auto; min-height: inherit;color:#FFFFFF; } .marketingBanner__button.button{min-width: 130px; border-radius:50px 50px 50px 50px;font-weight:normal; max-width:270px;} .smallerDiv .marketingBannerBtn{transform: scale(1) rotate(180deg) translateX(1px) translateY(1px) skewX(1deg) skewY(1deg);} .marketingBannerBtn .fa-chevron-down:before {content: "";} .marketingBannerBtn .fa {display: inline-block; font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome; font-size: inherit;color: #150526;}
